briefTitle: Trial of Linaclotide in Patients With Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation (IBS-C)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Trial of Linaclotide Administered Orally for 26 Weeks in Patients With Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and efficacy of linaclotide administered to patients with Irritable Bowel Syndrome with Constipation (IBS-C).

primaryOutcome.measure: Abdominal Pain and Complete Spontaneous Bowel Movement (APC) Responder, 9 Out of 12 Weeks
